text: And they became divided only after the knowledge that came to them, (because of ) mutual envy. And had a statement from your Lord not gone forth (for giving them time) till an appointed term it would have been judged between them. And those who were made to inherit the book after them, are in a restless doubt concerning the ( Quran ). would have been judged between them. And those who were made to inherit the book after them, are in a restless doubt concerning the ( Quran)
